name: Verbalize
description:
Verbalize is a VR English vocabulary learning game. You are able to interact with objects in the environment and learn the English words for them. You can also test yourself with minigames.  

The Initial version of the project is designed for Chinese native speakers learning English.

Credits 

Project Manager: Kyan Rowse

Programmers: Anthony Younes & Kyan Rowse

Game Designer: Jake Foster

Sound Designers: Nyle Gibbens & Kyan Rowse

Music Composition: Jordan Budge

Chinese Localization: Eric Tse

Graphic Design: Radhika Phand

Character Design and Animation: Anton Barker

3D Prop Designers: Jason Paul & Sidartha Dipayhana

Voice Over: Anna Faye
